text: aur firaun kee jaati ke pramukhon ne (usase) kahaah kya tum moosa aur usakee jaati ko chhod doge ki desh mein vidroh karen tatha tumhen aur tumhaare poojyon[1] ko chhod den? usane kahaah ham unake putron ko vadh kar denge aur unakee striyon ko jeevit rahane denge, ham unapar dabaav rakhate hain
